name: StructAI
description: Fine-tuned version of Meta LLaMA that can generate real-time visualizations of data structures.

name: NC Ratio Calculator
description: ML model that calculates the Nucleus-Cytoplasm ratio of a cell image.

name: BioSegment
description: Utilizes AI to segment Mitochondira and Cristae from EM images.

name: Squat Form Analyzer
description: Uses openCV + Mediapipe to analyze the depth of your squat.

name: Cop Classifier
description: Classifies cars as police vehicles or regular traffic. Can be used in traffic signals to detect cop cars.

name: MediCord
description: An app that transcribes and summarizes audio files quickly and efficiently for patient use after doctor visits.

name: SuperChat
description: A realtime chat app built for the future.

name: JobRecover
description: A web app made for HackTJ 7.5 and designed to connect employers to the unemployed, during difficult times. Thanks to Sritan and Nithil for making this project possible.

name: DevMedia
description: A social media app built for developers, by developers.

name: Chess AI
description: Play chess against an AI right in your browser!
